definition: sporting event/item on program of sports competition
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel
back of neck/item/thing/term (in a mathematical formula)/sum (of money)/classifier for principles, items, clauses, tasks, research projects etc

sentences.english: When was modern pentathlon introduced to the Olympic Games?
sentences.chinese: 現代五項是何時成爲奧運會比賽項目的？

sentences.english: A:Robert was the first prize winner for this race last year.
sentences.chinese: 羅伯特去年是這個比賽項目的冠軍得主。

sentences.english: How many non-Olympic events will be held in the Guangzhou Asian Games?
sentences.chinese: 廣州亞運會比賽項目中有多少個非奧運項目？

sentences.english: The next event will be the 100-metre race.
sentences.chinese: 下一個比賽項目是100米賽跑。

sentences.english: All Yanlord residents can participate in any of the events.
sentences.chinese: 仁恆居民可報全部比賽項目。

sentences.english: Only supposes the male project, in 1900 is listed as the Olympic Games event.
sentences.chinese: 僅設男子項目，1900年起被列爲奧運會比賽項目。

sentences.english: How many competition events will be held in the Guangzhou 2010 Asian Games?
sentences.chinese: 2010年廣州亞運會設多少個比賽項目？

sentences.english: The next event will be the 100 meters race.
sentences.chinese: 下一個比賽項目是一百米賽跑。

sentences.english: Hand grenade throw is one of the five events in the international military games.
sentences.chinese: 投擲手榴彈是國際軍事五項比賽項目之一。

sentences.english: It is one of Blang traditional competitive games.
sentences.chinese: 這個是布朗族的一項傳統比賽項目。

sentences.english: Rowing was officially recognized as an Olympic sport in 1908.
sentences.chinese: 賽艇是1908年被正式承認爲奧運會的比賽項目的。

sentences.english: Ground-sitting played volleyball is a formal competing event of the Olympic Games for the Handicapped.
sentences.chinese: 坐式排球運動是殘疾人奧運會正式比賽項目。

sentences.english: Maybe there is a chance to go to some events.
sentences.chinese: 也許有可能買到一些比賽項目的門票。

sentences.english: Orienteering is one of the directional movement of the main events.
sentences.chinese: 定向越野是定向運動的主要比賽項目之一。

definition: abbr. for 全國運動會|全国运动会[Quan2 guo2 Yun4 dong4 hui4]
